donation_seo_description: Your sponsor helps us to become the number 1 stock analysis platform in the world with the best price plans.
donation_intro_paragraph_1: Thank you for considering supporting our mission. As the sole person behind Stocknearâ€”handling everything from backend development to customer serviceâ€”I'm committed to keeping our platform affordable and accessible to all investors.
donation_intro_paragraph_2: Our Plans are priced ensure that high-quality stock data is within reach for retail investors of all backgrounds.
donation_support_paragraph_1: While the Membership is designed to sustain our basic operations, your additional support can help us go even further. By sponsoring, you're not just supporting a platform; you're investing in a vision of open, transparent, and affordable financial analysis.
donation_support_list_intro: Your support will directly contribute to:
donation_support_list_item_3: Furthering our goal to become the #1 stock analysis platform in the industry
donation_cta_paragraph_1: If you believe in our mission and want to support us beyond your Subscription, please support us via GitHub Sponsors. Every contribution, no matter the size, makes a significant impact on our ability to serve you and the retail investor community.
donation_cta_paragraph_2: Your support means the world to me and helps keep Stocknear running smoothly.
